Producer: Mike Karz, Brian Volk-Weiss, Barry Katz
Rating: R (Language|Crude Dialogue|Nudity|Some Drug Use|Strong Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Cursed since childhood, dentist Charlie Kagan (Dane Cook) cannot find the right woman. Even worse, he learns that each of his ex-girlfriends finds true love with the man she meets after her relationship with him ends. Hearing of Charlie's reputation as a good-luck charm, women from all over line up for a quick tryst. But when Charlie meets the woman (Jessica Alba) of his dreams, he must find a way to break the curse or risk losing her to the next man she meets.
Title: Good Luck Chuck
